name: Golden Gate Transit: Paratransit
fullDescription: Golden Gate Transit provides ADA paratransit service for eligible riders who cannot use regular Golden Gate Transit bus or ferry service due to a disability. Service operates in Marin and Sonoma counties.
whatTheyOffer:
- Door-to-door paratransit service
- Covers Golden Gate Transit bus and ferry service areas
- Advance reservations required
- Wheelchair accessible vehicles
howToGetIt:
1. Complete the ADA paratransit application
2. Application available at goldengatetransit.org
3. Assessment may be required
4. Once certified, call to schedule rides
keywords: Golden Gate, paratransit, ADA, Marin County, Sonoma, disability, wheelchair, door to door, ferry
